name: vr
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
abbreviation for virtual reality: a set of images and sounds, produced by a computer, that seem to represent a place or a situation that a person can take part in: the VR experience

[ C or U ]
  MARKETING abbreviation for vendor rating: a measurement of how effective a seller is, based on the opinions of customers
[ U ]
  IT abbreviation for virtual reality: a set of computer images and sounds which seem to represent a real place or situation that a person can be involved in: He was a pioneer in VR, creating a "virtual cockpit" for the U.S. Air Force. VR program/system/technology
